languages.text: "Хочу поощрить твою тягу к знаниям. Возьми из капеллы тома и свитки для личной коллекции".

traits.locale_text: "Хочу поощрить твою тягу к знаниям. Возьми из капеллы тома и свитки для личной коллекции".

languages.text: "I wish to nurture your thirst for knowledge. Take some tomes and scrolls from the chapel for your personal collection."
languages.original_text: "Хочу поощрить твою тягу к знаниям. Возьми из капеллы тома и свитки для личной коллекции".

traits.locale_text: "I wish to nurture your thirst for knowledge. Take some tomes and scrolls from the chapel for your personal collection."
"I wish to nurture your thirst for knowledge. Take some tomes and scrolls from the chapel for your personal collection."
"I wish to nurture your thirst for knowledge. Take some tomes and scrolls from the chapel for your personal collection."
"I wish to nurture your thirst for knowledge. Take some tomes and scrolls from the chapel for your personal collection."
"I wish to nurture your thirst for knowledge. Take some tomes and scrolls from the chapel for your personal collection."
"I wish to nurture your thirst for knowledge. Take some tomes and scrolls from the chapel for your personal collection."

languages.text: «Quiero alimentar su sed de conocimiento. Llévese unos libros y pergaminos de la capilla para su colección personal».
languages.original_text: "I wish to nurture your thirst for knowledge. Take some tomes and scrolls from the chapel for your personal collection."

languages.text: 「お前の知識への渇望を育ててやりたいのだ。礼拝堂にある書物や巻物をいくつか、個人的なコレクションとして持って行くといい」
languages.original_text: "I wish to nurture your thirst for knowledge. Take some tomes and scrolls from the chapel for your personal collection."

languages.text: “我希望能满足你对知识的渴望。你可以去礼拜堂自行挑选你喜欢的手稿与著作，把它们收为你的私人藏品。”
languages.original_text: "I wish to nurture your thirst for knowledge. Take some tomes and scrolls from the chapel for your personal collection."

languages.text: "Ich möchte Euren Wissensdurst stillen. Nehmt Euch für Eure persönliche Sammlung einige Bücher und Schriftrollen aus der Kapelle."
languages.original_text: "I wish to nurture your thirst for knowledge. Take some tomes and scrolls from the chapel for your personal collection."

languages.text: « Je souhaite alimenter votre soif de connaissances. Prenez quelques grimoires et parchemins dans la chapelle, pour les ajouter à votre collection personnelle. »
languages.original_text: "I wish to nurture your thirst for knowledge. Take some tomes and scrolls from the chapel for your personal collection."

languages.text: "İrfana karşı açlığını gidermek niyetindeyim. Şahsi koleksiyonuna eklemek için şapelden birkaç kitap ve tomar al."
languages.original_text: "I wish to nurture your thirst for knowledge. Take some tomes and scrolls from the chapel for your personal collection."
